programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: Fast Times at RKG: The F-Rod Rules!
programme.desc: Sam Strube helps finish the 1931 Model A F-Rod and takes it to the track.

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan
programme.sub-title: Drag Race Mustang vs. Andrade's Malibu!
programme.desc: The guys put John Andrade Jr. in a tiny truck and beat him in a mud drag race with the Dirt Track Camaro; Andrade challenges them to see what they can do with a derelict and parted-out Mustang against his 79 Chevy Malibu.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.sub-title: East Coast Junkyard T-37 Road Trip!
programme.desc: The guys attempt to check off the final five states Freiburger needs to hit all 50 by taking their junkyard T-37 across New England; the T-37 hits the road, and the road hits back before the guys leave their mark in New York City.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: Crusher Impala Runs 10s!
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich troubleshoot transmission issues and more in the 1969 Chevy Impala that's powered by a supercharged 498ci big-block V8, then take it back to the track to see if they can finally get their 10-second time slip.

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan
programme.sub-title: Motorhome Wheelies!
programme.desc: Finnegan, Newbern and Cotten do some wheelie R&D to find out what it takes to put a 1978 GMC Class C motorhome's tires in the air; with the help of pro wheelstander Mike Mantel, the guys take on the challenge of making dreams become reality.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.sub-title: Sick Week Trans Am Test Drive!
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan buy an '86 Trans Am and take it for its first road test on the drag-and-drive event Sick Week; with a swapped 350 V8 and a six-speed, the big question is whether they be able to make it faster each day or even finish the race.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: New Project 440 Dart Makeover!
programme.desc: Recently, while the guys were thrashing the Crusher Impala, Freiburger spotted a 440-swapped '68 Dart he couldn't pass up. Now, the guys pick up the Dart and take it home to give it an impressive engine bay makeover and horsepower-adding tune-up.

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan
programme.sub-title: Flares and Flair: Thunderin' Left in a Fox Body!
programme.desc: One crushed project means new parts for another; the guys take on a NASCAR stock car piloted by Corey LaJoie around Atlanta Motor Speedway by recycling the supercharger from their wrecked T-Bird and slapping it on a 1978 Ford Fairmont.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.sub-title: Trading Down and Giving Back!
programme.desc: Influencers taking on Eric Malone from "Fastest Cars in the Dirty South" in grudge races; Freiburger and Finnegan head in reverse by trading a clean duster for a worse car.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.sub-title: The Rubber Duck Firebird's Ultimate Drag Test!
programme.desc: The Rubber Duck Firebird goes on a 1,000-mile drag racing road trip.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.sub-title: Charger vs. Charger!
programme.desc: The General Mayhem and the Death Metal Charger road trip to DirtFish.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: F-Rod Begins and Cougar Ends!
programme.desc: David and Steve encounter further issues with the Bang-Shifting Cougar.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: It's Alive: The F-Rod Lives!
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich get the F-Rod 1931 Model A fired up and ready for racing.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: Wiring Explained: F-Rod Progress and Gargantuwagon Regress!
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich continue to work on the F-Rod until David encounters some significant complications in its wiring.

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan
programme.sub-title: Hill Climbing Miata
programme.desc: The guys transform a Miata into the ultimate nitrous toy, the Man-iata; Newbern challenges Finnegan and Cotten to see if they can keep up with his Honda Talon UTV.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.sub-title: Turbo 2JZ in the Death Metal Charger!
programme.desc: Finnegan and Tony Angelo take a terrible '68 to a whole new turbo-popping, flame-spewing, tire-shrieking level.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: Burnouts for Distance: Crop Duster Wins!
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich finish the 1970 Plymouth that has languished away on the farm for so long; they transformed it from junk into one of the nicest piles in the Roadkill fleet, and undoubtedly one of the best at brutal burnouts for distance.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.sub-title: Bang-Shifting Cougar and Two New Projects!
programme.desc: A '67 Cougar powered by a Windsor-based 360ci stroker and backed by a four-speed is back; Freiburger and Dulcich try to fix a multitude of issues and get it back on the road.

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan
programme.sub-title: Tiny Car? Triple the Horsepower!
programme.desc: It's not the size of the car that matters, it's how it's driven; Cotten and Newbern drastically improve the power-to-weight ratio of a teeny '72 Honda Z600 coupe in an attempt to set a record at MidPond Raceway.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.sub-title: Sick Week Trans Am Test Drive!
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan buy an '86 Trans Am and take it for its first road test on the drag-and-drive event Sick Week; with a swapped 350 V8 and a six-speed, the big question is whether they be able to make it faster each day or even finish the race.
